meshIneBits

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • meshIneBits.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.util.Observable
    A layer contains all the bit 3D for a given Z. These bits are organized following a PatternTemplate. In order to build the 3D bits, it has to start by building a Pattern for each slice. The referentialPattern determines the position and orientation of the bits. It is then cloned and shaped to fit the linked Slice.

        public Vector2 moveBit(Vector2 bitKey,

        Parameters:

        direction - the direction in local coordinate system of the bit
        Returns:
